vernac_cmds: Lemma cop_npar__inter_exists : forall A1 B1 A2 B2, Coplanar A1 B1 A2 B2 -> ~ Par A1 B1 A2 B2 -> exists X, Col X A1 B1 /\ Col X A2 B2.
Lemma cop_npar__inter : forall A1 B1 A2 B2, A1 <> B1 -> A2 <> B2 -> Coplanar A1 B1 A2 B2 -> ~ Par A1 B1 A2 B2 -> exists X, Inter A1 B1 A2 B2 X.
destruct (cop_npar__inter_exists A1 B1 A2 B2) as [X []].
Lemma parallel_uniqueness : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 P : Tpoint, Par A1 A2 B1 B2 -> Col P B1 B2 -> Par A1 A2 C1 C2 -> Col P C1 C2 -> Col C1 B1 B2 /\ Col C2 B1 B2.
Lemma par_trans : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2, Par A1 A2 B1 B2 -> Par B1 B2 C1 C2 -> Par A1 A2 C1 C2.
Lemma inter__npar : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 X, Inter A1 A2 B1 B2 X -> ~ Par A1 A2 B1 B2.
apply (par_not_col A1 A2 B1 B2 X); Col.
Lemma l12_16 : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 X, Par A1 A2 B1 B2 -> Coplanar B1 B2 C1 C2 -> Inter A1 A2 C1 C2 X -> exists Y, Inter B1 B2 C1 C2 Y.
apply par_trans with B1 B2; assumption.
Lemma par_dec : forall A B C D, Par A B C D \/ ~ Par A B C D.
Lemma par_not_par : forall A B C D P Q, Par A B C D -> ~Par A B P Q -> ~Par C D P Q.
intros A B C D P Q HPar HNPar.
apply par_trans with C D; Par.
Lemma cop_par__inter : forall A B C D P Q, Par A B C D -> ~Par A B P Q -> Coplanar C D P Q -> exists Y, Col P Q Y /\ Col C D Y.
intros A B C D P Q HPar HNPar HCop.
destruct (cop_npar__inter_exists C D P Q) as [Y []].
apply HNPar, par_trans with C D; assumption.
Lemma l12_19 : forall A B C D , ~Col A B C -> Par A B C D -> Par B C D A -> Cong A B C D /\ Cong B C D A /\ TS B D A C /\ TS A C B D.
assert(exists P, Midpoint P A C) by (eapply midpoint_existence).
assert_diffs; apply l12_17 with P; auto.
assert_diffs; apply l12_17 with P; Midpoint.
assert_diffs; apply (l6_21 A D C D); Col.
apply l12_18_c with P; Cong; Col.
apply l12_18_d with P; Cong; Col.
Lemma l12_20_bis : forall A B C D, Par A B C D -> Cong A B C D -> TS B D A C -> Par B C D A /\ Cong B C D A /\ TS A C B D.
apply not_strict_par1 with C C; Col; Par.
assert(exists P, Midpoint P A C) by (apply midpoint_existence).
assert_diffs; apply l12_17 with P; auto.
assert(D = D' \/ Midpoint C D D').
assert(Par B C D A) by Par.
assert(HH:=l12_19 A B C D H4 H H14).
apply (par_not_col A B C D A); Col.
Lemma l12_20 : forall A B C D, Par A B C D -> Cong A B C D -> TS A C B D -> Par B C D A /\ Cong B C D A /\ TS A C B D.
assert(HH:=l12_20_bis A B C D H H0 H2).
Lemma l12_21_a : forall A B C D, TS A C B D -> (Par A B C D -> CongA B A C D C A).
apply postulates_in_euclidean_context; simpl; repeat (try (left; reflexivity); right).
Lemma l12_21 : forall A B C D, TS A C B D -> (CongA B A C D C A <-> Par A B C D).
Lemma l12_22_a : forall A B C D P, Out P A C -> OS P A B D -> Par A B C D -> CongA B A P D C P.
cut (forall A B C D P, A <> P -> Bet P A C -> OS P A B D -> Par A B C D -> CongA B A P D C P).
intros Haux A B C D P HOut HOS HPar.
apply col_one_side with A; Col; Side.
intros A B C D P HAP HBet HOS HPar.
destruct (segment_construction B A B A) as [B' []].
apply conga_trans with B' A C.
apply l11_10 with B' C D A; try (apply out_trivial); auto; [|apply l6_6, bet_out; Between].
apply l12_21_a; [|apply par_col_par_2 with B; Col].
apply l9_2, l9_8_2 with B; [|apply col_one_side with P; Side; Col].
assert (HNCol : ~ Col P A B) by (apply one_side_not_col123 with D, HOS).
assert (HNCol1 : ~ Col B A C) by (intro; apply HNCol; ColR).
Lemma l12_22 : forall A B C D P, Out P A C -> OS P A B D -> (CongA B A P D C P <-> Par A B C D).
Lemma l12_23 : forall A B C, ~Col A B C -> exists B', exists C', TS A C B B' /\ TS A B C C' /\ Bet B' A C' /\ CongA A B C B A C' /\ CongA A C B C A B'.
assert(exists B0, Midpoint B0 A B) by (apply midpoint_existence).
assert(exists C0, Midpoint C0 A C) by (apply midpoint_existence).
prolong B C0 B' B C0.
prolong C B0 C' C B0.
assert(HH:= l12_21_a A C' B C H7 H9); CongA.
assert(HH:= l12_21_a C B A B' H6 H8); CongA.
Lemma cop_npars__inter_exists : forall A1 B1 A2 B2, Coplanar A1 B1 A2 B2 -> ~ Par_strict A1 B1 A2 B2 -> exists X, Col X A1 B1 /\ Col X A2 B2.
Lemma cop2_npar__inter : forall A B A' B' X Y, Coplanar A B X Y -> Coplanar A' B' X Y -> ~ Par A B A' B' -> (exists P, Col P X Y /\ (Col P A B \/ Col P A' B')).
assert(~ Par A' B' X Y).
destruct(cop_npar__inter_exists A' B' X Y) as [P []].
destruct(cop_npar__inter_exists A B X Y) as [P []].
Lemma not_par_one_not_par : forall A B A' B' X Y, ~Par A B A' B' -> ~Par A B X Y \/ ~Par A' B' X Y.
apply par_trans with X Y; Par.
Lemma col_par_par_col : forall A B C A' B' C', Col A B C -> Par A B A' B' -> Par B C B' C' -> Col A' B' C'.
Lemma cop_par_perp__perp : forall A B C D P Q, Par A B C D -> Perp A B P Q -> Coplanar C D P Q -> Perp C D P Q.
Lemma cop4_par_perp2__par : forall A B C D E F G H, Par A B C D -> Perp A B E F -> Perp C D G H -> Coplanar A B E G -> Coplanar A B E H -> Coplanar A B F G -> Coplanar A B F H -> Par E F G H.
Lemma not_par_inter_exists : forall A1 B1 A2 B2, ~ Par A1 B1 A2 B2 -> exists X, Col X A1 B1 /\ Col X A2 B2.
Lemma l12_16_2D : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 C1 C2 X, Par A1 A2 B1 B2 -> Inter A1 A2 C1 C2 X -> exists Y, Inter B1 B2 C1 C2 Y.
assert (HC := all_coplanar B1 B2 C1 C2).
apply l12_16 with A1 A2 X; assumption.
Lemma par_inter : forall A B C D P Q, Par A B C D -> ~Par A B P Q -> exists Y, Col P Q Y /\ Col C D Y.
assert (HC := all_coplanar C D P Q).
Lemma not_par_strict_inter_exists : forall A1 B1 A2 B2, ~Par_strict A1 B1 A2 B2 -> exists X, Col X A1 B1 /\ Col X A2 B2.
Lemma not_par_inter : forall A B A' B' X Y, ~Par A B A' B' -> (exists P, Col P X Y /\ (Col P A B \/ Col P A' B')).
Lemma par_perp__perp : forall A B C D P Q, Par A B C D -> Perp A B P Q -> Perp C D P Q.
intros A B C D P Q HPar HPer.
assert (HCop := all_coplanar C D P Q).
Lemma par_perp2__par : forall A B C D E F G H, Par A B C D -> Perp A B E F -> Perp C D G H -> Par E F G H.
intros A B C D; intros.
apply (cop4_par_perp2__par A B C D); try (apply all_coplanar); assumption.

command: destruct (cop_npar__inter_exists A1 B1 A2 B2) as [X []].
apply (par_not_col A1 A2 B1 B2 X); Col.
apply par_trans with B1 B2; assumption.
intros A B C D P Q HPar HNPar.
apply par_trans with C D; Par.
intros A B C D P Q HPar HNPar HCop.
destruct (cop_npar__inter_exists C D P Q) as [Y []].
apply HNPar, par_trans with C D; assumption.
assert(HH:=l12_20_bis A B C D H H0 H2).
apply postulates_in_euclidean_context; simpl; repeat (try (left; reflexivity); right).
cut (forall A B C D P, A <> P -> Bet P A C -> OS P A B D -> Par A B C D -> CongA B A P D C P).
intros Haux A B C D P HOut HOS HPar.
apply col_one_side with A; Col; Side.
intros A B C D P HAP HBet HOS HPar.
destruct (segment_construction B A B A) as [B' []].
apply conga_trans with B' A C.
apply l11_10 with B' C D A; try (apply out_trivial); auto; [|apply l6_6, bet_out; Between].
apply l12_21_a; [|apply par_col_par_2 with B; Col].
apply l9_2, l9_8_2 with B; [|apply col_one_side with P; Side; Col].
assert (HNCol : ~ Col P A B) by (apply one_side_not_col123 with D, HOS).
assert (HNCol1 : ~ Col B A C) by (intro; apply HNCol; ColR).
assert(~ Par A' B' X Y).
destruct(cop_npar__inter_exists A' B' X Y) as [P []].
destruct(cop_npar__inter_exists A B X Y) as [P []].
apply par_trans with X Y; Par.
assert (HC := all_coplanar B1 B2 C1 C2).
apply l12_16 with A1 A2 X; assumption.
assert (HC := all_coplanar C D P Q).
intros A B C D P Q HPar HPer.
assert (HCop := all_coplanar C D P Q).
intros A B C D; intros.
apply (cop4_par_perp2__par A B C D); try (apply all_coplanar); assumption.
